Recorded on each extension resource request if the difference is negative (i.e., the directory's creation time is more recent than the resource's last modification time.) For cases where the resource modification time is more recent, see Extensions.ResourceLastModifiedDelta instead.

histogram.name: Extensions.RuntimeHostPermissions.ExtensionHasWithheldHosts
histogram.summary: Whether an extension had host permissions withheld as a result of the RuntimeHostPermissions feature. Recorded once per extension at profile initialization if and only if the RuntimeHostPermissions feature is enabled and the extension requests any host permissions (i.e., could be affected by the feature).

histogram.name: Extensions.RuntimeHostPermissions.GrantedHostCount
histogram.summary: The number of hosts an extension has been granted explicit access to that it also requested (note that if the user granted unrequested hosts, those will not be included in this count). Recorded once per extension at profile initialization if and only if the RuntimeHostPermissions feature is enabled and the extension has had host permissions withheld. See also Extensions.RuntimeHostPermissions.ExtensionHasWithheldHosts.

histogram.name: Extensions.SandboxUnpackFailureReason
histogram.obsolete: Deprecated as of 02/2021 in favour of `Extensions.SandboxUnpackFailureReason2`.
histogram.summary: The reason an extension failed to unpack, recorded when a failure occurs.

histogram.name: Extensions.SandboxUnpackFailureReason2
histogram.summary:
The reason an extension failed to unpack, recorded when a failure occurs.
Replaced Extensions.SandboxUnpackFailureReason because the enum values were not in sync with the C++ enums.

histogram.name: Extensions.SandboxUnpackHashCheck
histogram.summary: Whether a CRX file hash sum was the same as in an updater manifest.

histogram.name: Extensions.SandboxUnpackSuccess
histogram.summary: Count the number of times a sandboxed CRX unpack succeeds.

histogram.name: Extensions.SearchEngineOverrides
histogram.summary: The number of enabled extensions with a search engine override specified in their manifest. Recorded once per profile at profile initialization.

histogram.name: Extensions.ServiceWorkerBackground.RegistrationStatus
histogram.summary: Tracks whether background service worker registration succeeded or not.

histogram.name: Extensions.ServiceWorkerBackground.RegistrationTime
histogram.summary: The amount of time it takes to register a service worker background script.

histogram.name: Extensions.ServiceWorkerBackground.StartWorkerStatus
histogram.summary: Tracks whether background service worker starting succeeded or not.

histogram.name: Extensions.ServiceWorkerBackground.StartWorkerTime
histogram.summary: The amount of time it takes to start the background service worker of an extension.

histogram.name: Extensions.SettingsOverridden.BackToGoogleNtpOverriddenDialogResult
histogram.summary: The action taken on the settings overridden dialog that was shown to alert the user of an extension overriding the New Tab Page, when the dialog shown is the version that asks the user if they want to go back to Google's New Tab Page. Recorded once per instance of the dialog being shown, after the action is taken.

histogram.name: Extensions.SettingsOverridden.BackToGoogleSearchOverriddenDialogResult
histogram.summary: The action taken on the settings overridden dialog that was shown to alert the user of an extension overriding the default search provider, when the dialog shown is the version that asks the user if they want to go back to Google search. Recorded once per instance of the dialog being shown, after the action is taken.

histogram.name: Extensions.SettingsOverridden.BackToOtherSearchOverriddenDialogResult
histogram.summary: The action taken on the settings overridden dialog that was shown to alert the user of an extension overriding the default search provider, when the dialog shown is the version that asks the user if they want to go back to a previous search engine that isn't Google. Recorded once per instance of the dialog being shown, after the action is taken.

histogram.name: Extensions.SettingsOverridden.GenericNtpOverriddenDialogResult
histogram.summary: The action taken on the settings overridden dialog that was shown to alert the user of an extension overriding the New Tab Page, when the dialog shown is the generic version. Recorded once per instance of the dialog being shown, after the action is taken.

histogram.name: Extensions.SettingsOverridden.GenericSearchOverriddenDialogResult
histogram.summary: The action taken on the settings overridden dialog that was shown to alert the user of an extension overriding the default search provider, when the dialog shown is the generic version. Recorded once per instance of the dialog being shown, after the action is taken.

histogram.name: Extensions.StartupPagesOverrides
histogram.summary: The number of enabled extensions with startup page overrides specified in their manifest. Recorded once per profile at profile initialization.

histogram.name: Extensions.SyncGetMessageBundle
histogram.summary: The amount of synchronous time spent retrieving an extension's message bundle (the collection of its i18n resources) from the browser.

histogram.name: Extensions.ThrottledNetworkRequestDelay
histogram.summary: The duration by which a network request was delayed while waiting for extension user script load. Recorded once per request that is delayed, at the time the resource resumes loading.

histogram.name: Extensions.Toolbar.InvocationSource
histogram.summary: The source that triggered an extension action. Recorded once per invocation of an extension action.

histogram.name: Extensions.Toolbar.PinnedExtensionCount2
histogram.summary: The number of extensions that the user has pinned on the toolbar. Recorded once per profile during initialization if the user has at least one extension with an action in the toolbar.

histogram.name: Extensions.Toolbar.PinnedExtensionPercentage3
histogram.summary: The percentage of extensions that the user has pinned to the toolbar (i.e., this will be 100 if the user has every extension pinned). Recorded once per profile during initialization if the user has at least one extension with an action in the toolbar.

histogram.name: Extensions.UninstallDialogAction
histogram.summary: The action that was taken from an extension uninstall dialog. Recorded once per dialog shown. Only recorded if all possible actions (including report abuse) were available on the dialog.

histogram.name: Extensions.UninstallSource
histogram.summary: The source for the extension uninstall. This is only recorded if an uninstall dialog is shown to the user (i.e., it is not recorded for internal "cleanups").

histogram.name: Extensions.UninstallType
histogram.summary: Uninstalls grouped by Extension::HistogramType.

histogram.name: Extensions.UpdateCheckApp
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of legacy packaged apps and hosted apps that were checked during an update check.

histogram.name: Extensions.UpdateCheckExtension
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.

histogram.name: Extensions.UpdateCheckGoogleUrl
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.

histogram.name: Extensions.UpdateCheckNoUrl
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of crx's with no update URL checked during an update check.

histogram.name: Extensions.UpdateCheckOtherUrl
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of crx's with a non-Google update URL that were checked during an update check.

histogram.name: Extensions.UpdateCheckPackagedApp
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of packaged apps that were checked during an update check.

histogram.name: Extensions.UpdateCheckTheme
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of themes that were checked during an update check.

histogram.name: Extensions.UpdateOnLoad
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of extensions that were updated at browser startup.

histogram.name: Extensions.UpdateSource
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Updates grouped by the location property in prefs.

histogram.name: Extensions.UpdateType
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Updates grouped by Extension::HistogramType.

histogram.name: Extensions.UsedMimeTypeHandler
histogram.summary: Tracks the usage of different MIME type handlers used to view files. It is recorded when the browser intercepts navigation with one of the type handlers.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebRequest.EventListenerFlag
histogram.summary: Records any flags that were registered in the extraInfoSpec of a webRequest listener, as well as the total number of listeners registered. Recorded each time a new listener is registered.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebRequest.KeepaliveRequestState
histogram.summary: Whether and how keepalive requests are blocked. There is a similar histgoram Net.KeepaliveRequest.BlockStatus. See there for the difference between the two histograms.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebRequest.OnBeforeSendHeadersEventResponse
histogram.summary:
For every network request visible to the Web Request API, this indicates whether any registered declarative rules or event listeners observed the onBeforeSendHeaders event.
This histogram is temporary, for investigating https://crbug.com/827582. It can probably be removed by M69.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebRequest.OnHeadersReceivedEventResponse
histogram.summary:
For every network request visible to the Web Request API, this indicates whether any registered declarative rules or event listeners observed the onHeadersReceived event.
This histogram is temporary, for investigating https://crbug.com/827582. It can probably be removed by M69.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebRequest.RequestHeaderAdded
histogram.summary: Records the request header added by extensions using the WebRequest API. Recorded for each network request during the OnBeforeSendHeaders stage. Multiple samples can be recorded per request.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebRequest.RequestHeaderChanged
histogram.summary: Records the request header modified by extensions using the WebRequest API. Recorded for each network request during the OnBeforeSendHeaders stage. Multiple samples can be recorded per request.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebRequest.RequestHeaderRemoved
histogram.summary: Records the request header removed by extensions using the WebRequest API. Recorded for each network request during the OnBeforeSendHeaders stage. Multiple samples can be recorded per request.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebRequest.ResponseHeaderAdded
histogram.summary: Records the response header added by extensions using the WebRequest API. This is logged for the cumulative delta across all the web request extensions. Recorded for each network request during the OnHeadersReceived stage. Multiple samples can be recorded per request.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebRequest.ResponseHeaderChanged
histogram.summary: Records the response header modified by extensions using the WebRequest API. This is logged for the cumulative delta across all the web request extensions. Recorded for each network request during the OnHeadersReceived stage. Multiple samples can be recorded per request.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebRequest.ResponseHeaderRemoved
histogram.summary: Records the response header removed by extensions using the WebRequest API. This is logged for the cumulative delta across all the web request extensions. Recorded for each network request during the OnHeadersReceived stage. Multiple samples can be recorded per request.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebRequest.TotalBlockingRequestTime
histogram.summary: The total time a network request took when at least one Web Request listener was registered at the start of the request, and a listener was blocked on the request. Measures from onBeforeRequest to onCompleted/onErrorOccurred, and does not include canceled or redirected requests.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebRequest.TotalExtraHeadersRequestTime
histogram.summary: The total time a network request took when at least one Web Request listener with 'extraHeaders' in the extraInfoSpec was registered at the start of the request. Measures from onBeforeRequest to onCompleted/onErrorOccurred, and does not include canceled or redirected requests.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebRequest.TotalRequestTime
histogram.summary: The total time a network request took when at least one Web Request listener was registered at the start of the request. Measures from onBeforeRequest to onCompleted/onErrorOccurred, and does not include canceled or redirected requests.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebRequestAction
histogram.summary: Counts the number of times an action is requested by extensions as part of the Web Request API. For a given web request stage, multiple actions may be logged.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebRequestBlockingCount
histogram.summary: Number of enabled extensions which have requested the "webRequestBlocking" permission. Includes all kinds of extensions, including component and unpacked extensions. Recorded during profile initialization.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebRequestCount
histogram.summary: Number of enabled extensions which have requested the "webRequest" permission. Includes all kinds of extensions, including component and unpacked extensions. Recorded during profile initialization.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebstoreDownload.InterruptReason
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The reason a webstore download was interrupted.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebstoreDownload.InterruptReceivedKBytes
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of KBytes received for a webstore download before it was interrupted.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebstoreDownload.InterruptTotalKBytes
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The total expected size in KBytes of an interrupted webstore download.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebstoreDownload.InterruptTotalSizeUnknown
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Tracks whether the total size of an interrupted webstore download was known.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebStoreInstall.EsbAllowlistParameter
histogram.summary: Reports the Safe Browsing CRX allowlist state received from Chrome Web Store when a user presses on "Add to Chrome" in Chrome Web Store.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebStoreInstall.NotAllowlistedInstalledWithFriction
histogram.summary: Reports when a user with install friction dialog enabled tries to install an extension that is not included in the Safe Browsing CRX allowlist. 'True' if the install dialog is accepted or 'False' if the friction dialog or install dialog is canceled.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebStoreInstall.NotAllowlistedInstalledWithoutFriction
histogram.summary: Reports when a user with install friction dialog disabled tries to install an extension that is not included in the Safe Browsing CRX allowlist. 'True' if the install dialog is accepted or 'False' if the install dialog is canceled.

histogram.name: Extensions.WebUi.DocumentLoadedInMainFrameTime{ExtensionWebUiPageType}
histogram.summary: The amount of time between starting the provisional load and fully loading the document in the main frame of the chrome://extensions page. This corresponds to the WebContentsObserver::DocumentLoadedInFrame method. {ExtensionWebUiPageType}

histogram.name: Extensions.WebUi.LoadCompletedInMainFrame{ExtensionWebUiPageType}
histogram.summary: The amount of time between starting the provisional load and having completed the onload handler in the main frame of the chrome://extensions page. This corresponds to the WebContentsObserver::DocumentOnLoadCompletedInMainFrame method. {ExtensionWebUiPageType}

histogram.name: Extensions.{ExtensionSource}ForceInstalledFailureManifestInvalidErrorDetail2
histogram.summary:
The detailed reason why enterprise policy forced extensions had failed to install because fetched update manifest was invalid. Recorded for each forced extension that failed to install after 5 minutes with Extensions.ForceInstalledFailureReason2 equal to MANIFEST_INVALID.
Replaced Extensions.ForceInstalledFailureManifestInvalidErrorDetail due to addition of new error BAD_APP_STATUS, and some of the errors that were MISSING_UPDATE_CHECK_TAG would now be reported as BAD_APP_STATUS.

variant.summary: Aggregated detailed failure reason for any type of extension
variant.obsolete: Deprecated as of 04/2021 as this histogram is split into variants `OffStore_` and `WebStore_`.

variant.name: OffStore_
variant.summary: Detailed failure reason for OffStore extensions

variant.name: WebStore_
variant.summary: Detailed failure reason for WebStore extensions

histogram.name: Extensions.{ExtensionSource}ForceInstalled{ErrorType}HttpErrorCode2
histogram.summary: HTTP error code for the last retry attempt when for enterprise policy forced extensions failed with {ErrorType}. Recorded for each forced extension that failed to install after 5 minutes with Extensions.`OffStore,WebStore`_ForceInstalledFailureReason3 equal to {ErrorType} and a HTTP response code was received. HTTP response code is received only if there was no network error. Replaced Extensions.ForceInstalledHttpErrorCode because error codes are now reported only when network error code is HTTP_RESPONSE_CODE_FAILURE.

variant.summary: Aggregated detailed failure reason for any type of extension

variant.name: OffStore_
variant.summary: Detailed failure reason for OffStore extensions

variant.name: WebStore_
variant.summary: Detailed failure reason for WebStore extensions
